post.body:
vinnie_jones wrote:
i like these mitm stuff altho they all lag me to a grindin halt hehe
Sorry performance is not great for you, vinnie. I feel the same - my old P4 2.4 + Radeon 9800Pro is really holding me back. When we do get an upgrade though, we'll have lots of stuff to replay

The latest news is that this project has turned into two maps. Ghetto 1 is as described above. It is a classic make it to morning i.e. find guns and ammo while it is light; when it gets dark, all hell breaks loose... can you make it to morning? It has an experimental pop-up script that improves performance a little but at the expense of too much work for me so don't expect me to develop it further.

Ghetto 2 is an arcade style map. It has three areas: a busy road where you can shoot cars for health and ammo; a landfill site where you can scavenge some goodies and a carpark/alley where you fight waves of beasts and blowup stuff.

Latest news.

The gameplay for mitm8 is like this....
By day, collect weapons by shooting cars or scavenging in the landfill.
By night, demons come out.
Advance levels and difficulty by heading north (return south for a breather if required).
Scoreboard now updates itself.
